text: @realDonaldTrump And,u were stuck on y’all doing the right thang,well we stuck on its 5mos.TOO late,u should have done right by us in 2019🗣When u 1st.found out about this Virus🦠..its called COVID-19 cause it started killing people in 2019,not February 2020 when”U”decided to take action...
